citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Two dogs did not receive pain medication as directed in the protocol. Protocol 21-04 specifies that opiod pain medication
will be given "approximately 30 minutes after induction" to help minimize pain and discomfort. On 10/18/23 and 11/8/23,
"Walter" and "Halston," respectively, did not receive opiods within the specified time period. IACUC protocols must contain
a full and complete description of all procedures to be performed on an animal. Deviations from protocols, especially
concerning painful procedures, could expose animals to unrelieved pain or discomfort. All protocol procedures must be
adhered to by the facility.
Correct from 4 January 2024 forward
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(e)(4) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
Two dogs did not receive pain medication as directed in the protocol. Protocol 21-04 specifies that opiod pain medication 
will be given "approximately 30 minutes after induction" to help minimize pain and discomfort. On 10/18/23 and 11/8/23, 
"Walter" and "Halston," respectively, did not receive opiods within the specified time period. IACUC protocols must contain 
a full and complete description of all procedures to be performed on an animal. Deviations from protocols, especially 
concerning painful procedures, could expose animals to unrelieved pain or discomfort. All protocol procedures must be 
adhered to by the facility. 
Correct from 4 January 2024 forward 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
 n
